article.title: AFCEA Presents Innovative Technology Awards
article.abstract: AFCEA presents awards to three individuals for innovative cyber technology solutions during a ceremony at the Defensive Cyber Operations Symposium. The winners were selected from 50 entries in AFCEA's Cyber Solutions Showcase.
article.text:
AFCEA presented awards to three individuals for innovative cyber technology solutions during a ceremony at the AFCEA International Defensive Cyber Operations Symposium in Baltimore. The winners were selected from 50 entries in AFCEA's Cyber Solutions Showcase.
The winners and the representatives receiving the awards on behalf of the companies are:
Best Overall
Aveshka Inc. Cloud Based Real-Time Cyber Monitoring Christopher Kenly
Most Innovative
CyberPoint International LLC Active Cyber Defense with SDN Zachary Miller
Best Value
CyberCompEx.org Fostering Connections Among Cybersecurity Enthusiasts Through Social Networking Rudy Pamintuan
